embeds.title: Guide to Wheel of Fortune
embeds.description: Wheel of Fortune <:eventwheel:909986289552617502> is a __7-day__ event where a player can participate to get hero shards.

fields.name: Rules
value<text>: • Players can play up to __200__ spins each day
• The first spin each day is free.
• Unused Raffle Tickets can be used in future Wheel of Fortune events.

fields.name: Best strategy
value<text>: • Distribute your spins so you can take advantage of free spins.
• Make sure you do not leave any Raffle Tickets <:aowraffle:1039016540332359721> unused.
• Statistically, doing 200 spins is the most economic. You will need about 18 800 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>.
